Yup. Greven's floating out there.

::Greven::

Greven looked up at the arriving shuttle and manuevered himself so 
that it could pick him up.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> OOC: Then is Greven in space????
> 
> Aelo/Perceptor/Ocipite:
> 
> Perceptor's and Ocipite's shuttle continued firing against 
> Energonians (25 shoots). Aelo found Greven and she arrived where he 
> was.
